```{r cars}
setwd("~/GitHub/BigData-Analytics")

library(haven)
library(car)

bd <- read.csv("pe_properties.csv", encoding = "UTF-8")
bd1 <- subset(bd, operation_type=="Venta")
bd_CD <- subset(bd1, property_type=="Departamento"|property_type=="Casa")
bd_CD <- subset(bd_CD, currency=="USD")
bd_CD <- subset(bd_CD, l3=="Lima")

misvars <- c("id", "ad_type", "start_date", "end_date", "created_on", "lat", "lon", "l1", "l2", "l3", "l4", "l5", "l6", "rooms", "bedrooms", "bathrooms", "surface_total", "surface_covered", "price", "currency", "property_type", "operation_type")
properati <- bd_CD[misvars]

write.csv(properati,'properati.csv', fileEncoding = "UTF-8")
```
